sn35.180-182:1: "Bhikkhus, you should abandon desire for whatever is suffering … . You should abandon lust for whatever is suffering … . You should abandon desire and lust for whatever is suffering. And what is suffering? Forms are suffering … Mental phenomena are suffering; you should abandon desire and lust for them. Bhikkhus, you should abandon desire and lust for whatever is suffering."sn.iv.5
